A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Wonderful! Saw it at a 1 am show AFTER an office Christmas party and it still captivated throughout the long running time. I don't understand the hate for this one--I thought it nicely balanced dramatic battle scenes with rewarding emotional beats\, gave all the major players a bit to do and introduced some new and interesting characters\, and some of the staging was beautifully operatic (that red room battle!). I am also a total Porg fan\, in case that's a litmus test for anyone.
